## ConnectionOptions type

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type ConnectionOptions<E = any> = Merge<ConnectParams<E>, {
    source?: E;
    target?: E;
    sourceEndpoint?: Endpoint;
    targetEndpoint?: Endpoint;
    previousConnection?: Connection<E>;
    geometry?: any;
}>;
```
<b>References:</b> [ConnectParams](./core.connectparams)<!-- -->, [Endpoint](./core.endpoint)<!-- -->, [Connection](./core.connection)
